title: queues
body: i have been placed into a lower prio queue for 5x 20mins. i have been waiting for 47mins for my first queue. i have been given these because i disconnected from the wifi in loading screen. this has happened to me 5 times today. totally unfair. tbh i feel like i will uninstall.

replies.body:
You aee responsible for making sure the network you are playing on is stable. When you connect to games late or drop during them it sets your team back and makes the experience worse for 9 other people.

You should have tried to fix your issue after the first game, not kept going for 5 more.
